title: Luxury Rural Retreat in Rajasthan
description: Switch off from the busy city life and embrace tranquility staying at Shahpura Bagh, one of Rajasthan's most luxurious hotels surrounded by 45-acre of glorious grounds. Reconnect with nature in this eco-friendly hotel and enjoy daily breakfast, delicious home cooked dinner, one cocktail per person each night and one guided excursion. Plus one child aged five and under stays for free with breakfast included.
